settings.title: HOW DO YOU DETERMINE AUTHENTICITY?
settings.answer: At Found Fashion all our items are guaranteed authentic and have gone through an authentication process by our team of experts. If it turns out otherwise, you will get your money back.

settings.title: WHERE DO YOU SOURCE YOUR ITEMS
settings.answer: This is understandably a question we get asked a lot. While we cannot list each consignor, our items are sourced from a combination of high net-worth individuals, leading fashion stylists as well as retailers looking to discreetly part with superbrand stock.

settings.title: DO YOU SHIP WORLDWIDE?
settings.answer: Absolutely, we ship worldwide! Any international deliveries are placed safely and with care through DHL Express on the same day the order is made. Note that some international deliveries (particularly those of high value) may incur customs charges which are outside of our control. Any customs charges are the responsibility of the buyer and payable solely by them.

settings.title: CAN YOU SOURCE ITEMS?
settings.answer: We are happy to assist with sourcing an item but this will come with a sourcing fee. Please reach out to us.

settings.title: I FOUND SOMETHING I LOVE BUT IT IS NOT MY SIZE. WHAT DO I DO?
settings.answer: You can reach out to us and we can try and source the item for you through our consignees.

settings.title: THE ITEM SAYS SOLD. DO YOU HAVE ANOTHER?
settings.answer: Once an item is marked as 'Sold' we no longer will have this item available. You can reach out to us to source for you.

settings.title: HOW DO I SELL MY ITEM WITH YOU?
settings.answer: Please visit our 'Sell My Item' page. This will provide you will a form to let us know what you are looking to sell.

settings.title: HOW DO YOU DETERMINE THE PRICE?
settings.answer: We don't like to hold stock for too long, so we will provide a price that is realistic. When we price items our expert team will analyse the current market price against our buyers expectations. This will ensure that you get a price offer that will sell and provide you with the best experience.

settings.title: HOW IS COMMISSION DETERMINED?
settings.answer:
Item Value: Up to £1500

Commission we take is : 20%

Item Value: £1500 - £10,000

Commission we take is : 15%

Item Value: £10,000 - £50,000

Commission we take is : 10%

For exotic pieces we may negotiate a mutual commission rate. Please note that will only be for pieces that we determine are rare and exotic.

settings.title: MY ITEM HAS SOLD. WHEN DO I GET PAID?
settings.answer: Once your item has sold. We will hold the payment for 14 days which is the buyer cool off period. Once this period is up then we will transfer your money to your chosen bank account.
